description:
Sango goes back to the slayer village in order to fix her Hiraikotsu, and Kagome goes back to the well so she can return to the present day. Along the way, she finds a Nimenka, a fruit that looks like a face.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Fateful Night in Togenkyo, Part I
Subete wa Tougenkyou no Yoru ni (Zenpen)
Tudo o que aconteceu na noite em Tougenkyou (Parte 1)
Una noche en un paraíso extraño (1º parte)
すべては桃源郷の夜に (前編)
